backend/main.mo: Defines core data models and storage maps for videos, users, comments, playlists, and AI image saving, including image-metadata moderation before saving.
backend/moderation.mo: Provides simple keyword-based moderation for image metadata and chat messages, flagging sexually explicit content.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their responsibilities and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and color variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting up metadata, PWA manifest links, Apple PWA support, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, shortcuts, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Offline fallback page displayed when network is unavailable.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline fallback, and cache versioning for the PWA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling global state, authentication, routing, and rendering pages inside AppShell.
frontend/src/components/AddToPlaylistDia: Dialog for authenticated users to add a video to an existing playlist or create a new one.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/Images: Main UI for generating, uploading, editing, and saving images, managing tabs and state for the AI image workflow.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/PromoC: Canvas editor that overlays text on a base image, supports erasing, downloading, and saving promo images.
frontend/src/components/ai-studio/SavedI: Displays saved images with options to reopen, download, and delete them using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/AiEditDialog.tsx: Dialog showing AI-generated metadata suggestions and allowing users to apply them individually or all at once.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, sidebar, footer, and main content area with navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Comment system supporting posting, deleting, pinning, and sorting comments with authentication and subscription checks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying branding, an external link, and optional navigation to YouTubeMe.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling search, login/logout, subscription display, and sidebar toggling.
frontend/src/components/InstallAppAction: Renders a button or menu item to trigger PWA installation and shows iOS instructions when needed.
frontend/src/components/InternetIdentity: Displays a dialog explaining Internet Identity sign‑in methods with actions to continue or cancel.
frontend/src/components/IosInstallInstru: Provides a step‑by‑step dialog for adding the PWA to an iOS home screen.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter a name and submit their initial profile.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallBanner: Shows a dismissible bottom banner prompting users to install the PWA if eligible.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation listing pages based on authentication and subscription state with mobile open/close behavior.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin‑only modal for configuring Stripe keys, allowed countries, and payout destination.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Card displaying video thumbnail, title, channel, metrics, and tags with click handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInstallAppEntryPoi: Hook that determines when to show an install action and triggers native PWA installation or iOS instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Hook managing PWA installability state using a shared store and exposing a method to trigger the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, AI stats, purchases, chat, and other app data with caching and mutation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for light/dark themes, safe-area handling, accessibility tweaks, and mobile performance optimizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AiChatRoomPage.tsx: Implements the real‑time AI chat room with authentication checks, message validation, message posting, and auto‑scrolling UI.
frontend/src/pages/AiGenerationPaymentCa: Shows a payment cancellation screen for AI Studio access with navigation options back to the studio or home.
frontend/src/pages/AiGenerationPaymentSu: Verifies Stripe sessions, grants AI access, and renders success or error states after payment completion.
frontend/src/pages/AiStudioPage.tsx: Provides the main AI Studio interface for generating videos or images, tracking generation time, handling purchases, and navigating to upload flow.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelPage.tsx: Handles viewing and editing a user's channel, including channel creation, updates, and listing their videos.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorStudioPage.tsx: Displays the creator's video management dashboard with editing and viewing options, gated by authentication.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Provides entry points to AI Studio, AI Chat Room, and an external YouTube-style site via interactive cards.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPaymentFailur: Shows a payment cancellation message with navigation back to the video or home.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadPaymentSucces: Verifies payment for a video download and shows success or failure status with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays all videos or search results with loading states and entry points to AI features.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a generic payment failure message with options to return home or retry.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Stripe payment status, updates user profile, and conditionally renders success, error, or loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PlaylistDetailPage.ts: Loads a playlist and its videos, displays them with metadata, and handles loading and missing-playlist cases.
frontend/src/pages/PlaylistsPage.tsx: Shows user playlists, supports playlist creation via a dialog, and handles authentication and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Displays subscription options, checks Stripe config, and creates a checkout session for premium upgrades.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Handles authenticated video uploads with metadata, trimming, thumbnail generation, and premium checks.
frontend/src/pages/VideoEditPage.tsx: Loads video metadata for editing, supports thumbnail and tag updates, and offers optional AI-generated suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: React page that loads a video, handles likes, views, comments, and purchase/download flow with subscription checks.
frontend/src/pages/YouTubeMePage.tsx: Static informational page describing YouTubeMe.xyz and its features as a companion frontend for metube.xyz.
frontend/src/utils/aiEditHeuristics.ts: Implements client-side heuristics to improve titles, descriptions, and tags without external AI services.
frontend/src/utils/aiImageGenerator.ts: Generates styled images on‑device using Canvas with deterministic colors, gender inference, and multiple rendering modes.
frontend/src/utils/aiVideoGenerator.ts: Creates simple client-side videos using Canvas and MediaRecorder with fallback resolution handling and background support.
frontend/src/utils/canvasExport.ts: Utility functions to export canvas content as PNG, data URLs, blob URLs, and load images from files.
frontend/src/utils/chatModeration.ts: Client-side filter that blocks chat messages containing sexually explicit keywords.
frontend/src/utils/contentPolicy.ts: Provides permissive AI generation policy utilities with no prompt blocking and a generic guideline message.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides helpers to download blobs, data URLs, and images as PNG files and includes filename sanitization and timestamped filename generation.
frontend/src/utils/fetchImageFromUrl.ts: Fetches and validates remote images over HTTP/HTTPS, ensuring correct content type and loading them into an HTMLImageElement.
frontend/src/utils/networkGuards.ts: Defines local‑only operation guards and markers to ensure no external AI API calls occur, especially for image generation.
frontend/src/utils/uploadModeration.ts: Checks upload metadata for sexually explicit keywords and blocks uploads containing restricted terms.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and applying plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state, architectural notes, known issues, branding changes, and a list of existing features for MeTube/MeTube AI Studios.
